FuncDef:
The flexe-clientid command configures the client-id parameter of the FlexE client, that is, the service number of the FlexE client in the FlexE group.
The undo flexe-clientid command restores the default client-id parameter of a FlexE client.
By default, the client ID of a FlexE client has not been configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a client ID, used for packet identification. The client IDs of interconnected FlexE client must be the same.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 65535 .

Examples: Warning: The traffic on this interface may be interrupted if the operation is performed. Continue? [Y/N]:y
Warning: The traffic on this interface may be interrupted if the operation is performed. Continue? [Y/N]:y
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To ensure proper communication between interworking devices, run the client-id command on the interconnected FlexE clients to configure the same client ID.
